ProductPage.Title: Comodo Code Signing Certificate
ProductPage.Description: These code signing certificates helps to ensure that any code or content you’re looking to distribute over the internet is safe from modification, re-hosting, and impersonation by malicious third parties.

ProductPage.Title: Domain Validated UCC SSL
ProductPage.Description: With this standard validated SSL certificate The Comodo Domain Validated (DV) UCC, quickly secure your multiple domains. It's one of the product specially designed for Microsoft Exchange 2010 and Office Communications Server 2007.

ProductPage.Title: Comodo Elite SSL
ProductPage.Description: The Comodo Elite SSL certificate is the best choice for medium ecommerce websites and other business who are looking for budget-friendly way to gain the trust of their customers.

ProductPage.Title: Comodo Essential SSL Certificate
ProductPage.Description: If you are looking for certificate to be used for internal testing domains or light ecommerce websites, you are at right place. Essential SSL Certificate is best to go with.

ProductPage.Title: Comodo EssentialSSL Wildcard Certificate
ProductPage.Description: This certificate will secure an unlimited number of subdomains which makes management and provisioning very easy. EssentialSSL Wildcard certificate will provide you with unlimited server licensing, along with a static site seal.

ProductPage.Title: Comodo EV Multi-Domain SSL Certificate
ProductPage.Description: Flexibility is crucial when it comes to managing multiple sites, which is where this Extended Validation (EV) certificate comes in. By offering features such as 256-bit encryption, the green address bar, SAN support (up to 250 additional domains), and the Comodo Secured Seal, all visitors will be aware of and appreciate the level of protection offered.

ProductPage.Title: Comodo EV SSL Certificate
ProductPage.Description: In addition to the green address bar, Comodo EV SSL Certificate features a HackerGuardian Vulnerability Scan, a free site seal free PCI scanning, free daily website scanning, a post-install health check, and the "point-to-verify" Comodo trustmark, which means it comes with tremendous value for your money.

ProductPage.Title: Comodo HackerGuardian PCI Scan Control Center
ProductPage.Keywords: Comodo HackerGuardian PCI Scan Control Center
ProductPage.Description: Comodo HackerGuardian PCI Scan Control Center is one of the certificate, which helps you to meet the industry standards set by the Payment Card Industry (PCI). Easily view and manage detailed vulnerability reports to make certain that your solution is up to date with the latest rules and regulations.

ProductPage.Title: Comodo HackerProof Trust Mark including Daily Vulnerability Scan
ProductPage.Keywords: Comodo HackerProof Trust Mark including Daily Vulnerability Scan
ProductPage.Description: Place a Trust Mark on your site of a reputable brand that will not only build trust, but also boost confidence among the visitors of your site. With this certificate, visitors will be aware of your dedication towards safety.

ProductPage.Title: Comodo InstantSSL Certificate
ProductPage.Description: This security product is ideal for light ecommerce sites interested in boosting their trust quickly and affordably. This certificate will not only encrypt information sent from browsers to your server, but will also increase the trust visitors have in your website.

ProductPage.Title: Comodo Premium SSL Certificate
ProductPage.Description: Provides full assurance to your customers beyond encryption by adding trust to your business. This Organization Validated (OV) certificate offers 256-bit encryption along with the recognized Comodo Site Seal. Your customers will know that their information is safe and sound.

ProductPage.Title: Comodo InstantSSL Pro Certificate
ProductPage.Description: This certificate will enable many trust indicators on your website, along with providing strong 256-bit encryption. Once installed, your site will reap the benefits of the padlock icon in the URL bar, "https" in front of the address, and the dynamic Comodo Secure Site Seal.

ProductPage.Title: Comodo Multi-Domain SSL Certificate
ProductPage.Description: With Comodo Multi-Domain SSL Certificate you can cover up to 100 domains with just one certificate. In addition to SAN support, this certificate offers a dynamic site seal and unlimited server licensing. This multi-domain certificate is an excellent option for small to medium sized companies that want to make managing and provisioning their domains as simple as possible.

ProductPage.Title: Comodo Multi-Domain Wildcard SSL Certificate
ProductPage.Description: Comodo Multi-Domain Wildcard SSL Certificate, is the option to go with if you are looking to secure an unlimited number of sub-domains under multiple domains. This business validated certificate is an excellent choice for companies that have a lot of domain names on the same server.

ProductPage.Title: Comodo PCI Scanning Enterprise Edition
ProductPage.Description: Comodo PCI Scanning Enterprise Edition is the best choice if you’ve web host or payment gateways and you want PCI Compliance scanning on multiple servers. Additionally get features likes 'Ready-to-submit' PCI compliance reports to send to your acquiring bank, unlimited scans for up to 20 external or internal IP addresses and many more.

ProductPage.Title: PositiveSSL Multi-Domain Certificate
ProductPage.Description: If you need a quick way to secure multiple domains on a single SSL certificate, then the Comodo Positive Multi-Domain SSL is the cert for you. This certificate can secure up to 250 total domains and is typically issued in mere minutes, once domain ownership is verified. As an entry-level Domain Validated (DV) option, the Comodo Positive Multi-Domain SSL is an excellent option for start-up ecommerce sites and other small businesses looking for a little boost with regards to encryption and sales.

ProductPage.Title: PositiveSSL Multi-Domain Wildcard Certificate
ProductPage.Description: Secure your one main domain with multiple sub-domains using this PositiveSSL Multi-Domain Wildcard Certificate. It's one of the best and economical certificate which can be an ideal solution for your e-commerce websites, payment pages, mail servers and much more.

ProductPage.Title: Comodo PositiveSSL Certificate
ProductPage.Description: For a fast website security solution, the Comodo Positive SSL certificate is the answer for you. This domain validated certificate offers industry standard encryption at an unbelievable price. Plus, this certificate comes backed by the Comodo brand, one of the most trusted names in internet security. As a basic SSL certificate, the Comodo Positive SSL is an excellent solution for internal domains and other domain names where you need fast and simple security without having to worry about injecting much trust into the site.

ProductPage.Title: Comodo PositiveSSL Wildcard Certificate
ProductPage.Description: Looking for a way to quickly and easily get the valued https displayed on a main domain and all of your subdomains? Then the Comodo Positive SSL Wildcard is the certificate for you. Speed and reliability are two adjectives that come to mind when describing this certificate. That’s because this wildcard certificate is a basic, Domain Validated (DV) certificate and can be issued in mere minutes. Also, with 99.3% browser recognition and solid mobile compatibility, the Comodo Positive SSL Wildcard can be relied on by most light ecommerce websites.

ProductPage.Title: Comodo PremiumSSL Wildcard Certificate
ProductPage.Description: Comodo PremiumSSL Wildcard Certificate offers the dynamic Comodo site seal and unlimited server licensing. You will also be able to secure one main domain and multiple subdomains. This wildcard certificate is an excellent option for medium-sized companies and ecommerce sites that wish to bolster the trust their users will have with them.

ProductPage.Title: Comodo SSL Certificate
ProductPage.Description: Comodo SSL Certificate a domain validated certificate can be issued in minutes. On top of encryption, this certificate will show your customers that your site has been vetted by a leading internet security specialist, so they’ll know it’s safe to do business with you. This certificate comes with dynamic site seal and unlimited server licensing.

ProductPage.Title: Comodo Unified Communications Wildcard Certificate
ProductPage.Description: Comodo Unified Communications Wildcard Certificate is a perfect blend of Unified Communication certificate and a Wildcard Certificate. Secure your Microsoft Exchange and Office Communications infrastructures with an ease.

ProductPage.Title: Comodo Unified Communications Certificate
ProductPage.Description: A single SSL certificate Comodo Unified Communications can provide secured communications on many different domains, both internal and external, which will reduce the complexity of your server security administration, along with reducing cost.

ProductPage.Title: Comodo Wildcard SSL Certificate
ProductPage.Description: Are you looking to secure one main domain, along with all of your subdomains? If so, then the Comodo Wildcard SSL certificate is an excellent option. With just one certificate, you can cover your one main domain with unlimited subdomains. As its Domain Validated (DV) certificate, this certificate can be issued in few minutes. One of the easiest and most economical Wildcard options, this certificate is perfect for small to medium sized businesses and lower-traffic ecommerce sites.

ProductPage.Title: Web Inspector Starter
ProductPage.Description: Protect your website with daily monitoring for blacklists, on-site malware, and PCI compliance scanning. You’ll be informed of any issues possible for your website and get the added trust benefit of the Comodo Web Inspector Seal, so your customers will see your investment in their security.

ProductPage.Title: Web Inspector Plus
ProductPage.Description: Protect your website with daily monitoring for blacklists, on-site malware, and PCI compliance scanning. You’ll be informed of any issues possible for your website and get the added trust benefit of the Comodo Web Inspector Seal, so your customers will see your investment in their security.

ProductPage.Title: Web Inspector Premium
ProductPage.Description: Protect your website with daily monitoring for blacklists, on-site malware, and PCI compliance scanning. You’ll be informed of any issues possible for your website and get the added trust benefit of the Comodo Web Inspector Seal, so your customers will see your investment in their security.

ProductPage.Title: Web Inspector Enterprise
ProductPage.Description: Protect your website with daily monitoring for blacklists, on-site malware, and PCI compliance scanning. You’ll be informed of any issues possible for your website and get the added trust benefit of the Comodo Web Inspector Seal, so your customers will see your investment in their security.

ProductPage.Title: Certum Commercial SSL
ProductPage.Description: Provides a quick and simple solution to protect customer’s information from falling into the wrong hands with this Domain Validated certificate. By securing the connection in 256-bit encryption, your customer can rest assured that all transmitted and received information is secured, and you can showcase this security to your clients by having the CERTUM seal present on your site.

ProductPage.Title: CERTUM Commercial SSL WildCard Certificate
ProductPage.Description: CERTUM Commercial SSL WildCard Certificate offers a simple and quick solution that will not only encrypt your primarily domain, but all the subdomains associated with this domain on this Domain Validated (DV) certificate. Customers will shop at ease knowing that your site is 256-bit encrypted, especially when they see the CERTUM seal present on the domain.

ProductPage.Title: CERTUM Trusted SSL Certificate
ProductPage.Description: This Organization Validated (OV) certificate will let your customers know that your company is safe to do business with. Your customers will feel at ease knowing that your business's website is protected with 256-bit encryption, especially once they see the CERTUM seal on your site.

ProductPage.Title: CERTUM Trusted SSL Wildcard Certificate
ProductPage.Description: With the Certum Trusted SSL Wildcard certificate, you can get a premium and economical security product without breaking your budget. That's because with just one certificate, you can cover your main domain and all of your accompanying subdomains. Additionally, because this is an Organization Validated (OV) cert, it includes a dynamic site seal that will display your validated company information, instantly assuring your online customers that you are who you say you are. This certificate will also activate "https" next to your URL and display the trusted padlock icon. The Certum Trusted SSL Wildcard certificate is perfect for any company looking to secure all of their subdomains and boost the trust of their website.

ProductPage.Title: CERTUM Basic ID Certificate
ProductPage.Description: CERTUM Basic ID Certificate provides a quick solution to encrypt all electronic communication on the web; such as, both emails and files. By using a public key, the certificate ensures that all information, both transmitted and received, is authentic, means nobody has intercepted, read or forged documents within the communication.

ProductPage.Title: CERTUM Enterprise ID Certificate
ProductPage.Description: Provides safety and security for signing the most important and sensitive documents a company, corporation or enterprise could utilize. Enterprise ID provides the highest level of security available for CERTUM for any other type of PCC ID certificates.

ProductPage.Title: CERTUM Professional ID Certificate
ProductPage.Description: CERTUM Professional ID Certificate offers a premium solution to verify the authenticity of all user’s identities and ensuring that their email address and company details are matched inside the certificate.

ProductPage.Title: Comodo Personal Authentication Basic Certificate
ProductPage.Description: Comodo Personal Authentication Certificates (CPAC Basics) are easy and affordable solutions used to secure business communications. These certificates allow you to encrypt and digitally sign email communications, offer two-factor authentication of users and employees, secure important company documents sent across the network, and will authenticate to ensure they have clearance to access online servers.

ProductPage.Title: Comodo Personal Authentication Pro Certificate
ProductPage.Description: Comodo Personal Authentication Certificates (CPAC Pro) are easy and affordable solutions used to secure business communications. These certificates allow you to encrypt and digitally sign email communications, offer two-factor authentication of users and employees, secure important company documents sent across the network, and will authenticate to ensure they have clearance to access online servers

ProductPage.Title: Comodo Personal Authentication Enterprise Certificate
ProductPage.Description: Comodo Personal Authentication Certificates (CPAC Enterprise) are easy and affordable solutions used to secure business communications. These certificates allow you to encrypt and digitally sign email communications, offer two-factor authentication of users and employees, secure important company documents sent across the network, and will authenticate to ensure they have clearance to access online servers

ProductPage.Title: Symantec Secure Site Multi-Domain Wildcard
ProductPage.Description: The Symantec Secure Site Multi-Domain Wildcard is one of the most versatile, feature-rich Organization Validated (OV) certificates in the entire SSL industry. It comes bundled with a Wildcard SAN, giving you the flexibility to secure an unlimited number of Sub-Domains that accompany your main domain. Best of all, this Certificate offers the highest possible encryption strength, daily malware scanning and a NetSure Warranty of $1,500,000.

ProductPage.Title: Symantec® Secure Site Pro Multi-Domain Wildcard
ProductPage.Keywords: Symantec® Secure Site Pro Multi-Domain Wildcard
ProductPage.Description: Symantec™ Secure Site Pro Multi-Domain Wildcard is a comprehensive and trusted SSL solution goes well beyond standard encryption, allowing you to secure your entire portfolio of domains and Sub-Domains on a single certificate. This SSL certificate comes packaged with daily malware scanning and a vulnerability assessment. It’s a feature-rich Organization Validated (OV) certificate, which is an ideal solution for any business looking to throw its name in with the leaders in their industry.

ProductPage.Title: GeoTrust True BusinessID with Multi-Domain Wildcard
ProductPage.Keywords: GeoTrust True BusinessID with Multi-Domain Wildcard
ProductPage.Description: If you need to secure multiple domains or Sub-Domains, the GeoTrust True BusinessID with Multi-Domain Wildcard SSL certificate is the ideal choice. This certificate comes standard with two Wildcard SANS, and customers have the ability to purchase additional Wildcard SANs as per their needs. Best of all, this certificate offers full business validation, so your customers will be aware that you went the extra mile to authenticate yourself.

ProductPage.Title: Thawte SSL Webserver Multi-Domain Wildcard
ProductPage.Description: The Thawte SSL WebServer Multi-Domain Wildcard SSL certificate is one of the most versatile SSL certificates available on the market today. It’s an excellent certificate for businesses looking to go beyond just encryption for their entire portfolio of domains and Sub-Domains. It’s perfect for medium to larger-sized companies, or any business that places the highest stock in their customers' trust and assurance.

ProductPage.Title: Symantec® Secure Site Pro SHA-1 Private
ProductPage.Keywords: Symantec® Secure Site Pro SHA-1 Private
ProductPage.Description: Now you can secure legacy machines and systems that are not compatible with the industry-mandated SHA-2 hashing algorithm, thanks to the Symantec™ Secure Site Pro SHA-1 Private. It provides up to 256-bit encryption strength and comes with a 2048-bit RSA signature key. The Secure Site Pro SHA-1 Private comes with either SHA-1 full chain or SHA-mixed chain and is perfect for use with private networks, network appliances and a wide range of other enterprise-level functions.

ProductPage.Title: Basic Web Site Anti-Malware Scan
ProductPage.Description: Because malware is usually hidden in your code, users are not able to see it. With this product, your site will have the tools to withstand the toughest hackers with a daily scan. If anything is detected, you will be notified and directed to a list of infected pages and the code causing the problem. Your system administrator will now have the opportunity to delete all instances of the code before it becomes a problem for your customers.
